Articles.Content:
The almighty god returns. And as promised levels all the mountains and hills..... I stare in awe and a little confused! Now what? [http://biblehub.com/luke/3-5.htm](http://biblehub.com/luke/3-5.htm) <- To clarify.

 (Wasn't sure of the wording but I knew it sounded familiar. Not sure if this refers to Armageddon or something else. But hey.)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-12T17:27:35Z" title="03/12/2015 05:27  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 12, 2015</time> by Arugela**

> 
> The almighty god returns. And as promised levels all the mountains and hills..... I stare in awe and a little confused! Now what? [http://biblehub.com/luke/3-5.htm](http://biblehub.com/luke/3-5.htm) <- To clarify.
>  (Wasn't sure of the wording but I knew it sounded familiar. Not sure if this refers to Armageddon or something else. But hey.)

I don't understang. but since it has to do with religion, I call sam(from a show my sister watches. he killed kronos)

my hill.

I take it through military force.

My military hill.

I wipe you and your hill out with my wave motion gun (Space Battleship Yamato reference).

My crater!

i delete that movie.

my crater

I call paradox out on you.

your paradox and my hill.

i use *MAGIC* to claim the hill

my hill defended by said *MAGIC*

I use technology (which is superior in all ways) to destroy the universe. 

My nonexistence.

I bend down and plopped some new mysterious substance into the universe! 

My pile of new existence.

I claim a hill in that existance

my hill

Your hill is on my new pile. And as the new creator of existence your hill is by definition my hill and I own you and everything you own from now on.

My pile of new existence.

I rebel like the silver surfer.

my hill.

I kill Arugela, and buy a computer.

[My virtual hill.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bliss_%28image%29)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-12T19:38:20Z" title="03/12/2015 07:38  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 12, 2015</time> by Souper**

I hack into it, and I claim it.

My (still) virtual hill.

I hack it back from you.

My virtual glitchy hill.

I put a virus on the internet, deleting all image files that anybody owns the moment they open up a web browser.

I then claim the sph as my hill.

my hill.

I shut down the KSP, the kovernment comes along and tears the entire KSC. and then they make me president.

My kerbal kovernment of kerbin.

I become the leader of the Kerbal Sovyetskiy Sotsialisticheskikh Respublik and nuke your government into surrender. I then take over your land.

My KSSR and conquered land.

I talk peace to your people they rebel against you I creat the perfect utopia 

my utopia please don't kill my people

Being that you are on a small hill that came out of me your attempt to kill me failed. Particularly since you cannot gather enough energy to destroy what created the energy and matter you now live on. I remind you of this. (or is souper still bigger than the pile. How did he buy the computer?)

By extension my utopia. On my pile of existence. (it's oddly dung hill shaped.)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-13T13:50:05Z" title="03/13/2015 01:50  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 13, 2015</time> by Arugela**

I am still leader of the utopia 

dont don't kill my people

My existence disrupts your utopia and it fragments into many nations, sects, and religions!

My pile of nations, sects, and religions. On my pile of existence! 8p

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-13T13:46:32Z" title="03/13/2015 01:46  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 13, 2015</time> by Arugela**

I go crazy build a neutron bomb destroy the universe and every thing out of it 

I talk the rubble and make a pet kraken my pet kraken

i SAID DONT KILL MY PEOPLE

i fire an Anti-Bio beam and kill all your biological specimens. this includes your people and your pet kraken

i then build impenetrable defenses all controlled from the inside by me. with no internet connection or electronic connection to the rest of the world.

My very Sterile hill with unbreakable and unhackable defenses

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-13T14:37:20Z" title="03/13/2015 02:37  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 13, 2015</time> by teepee2345**

I use the triforce and wish your defense away 

my and your hill
